de.hebis.it.hds.gnd.in.subfields

Class SubFieldTools

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.hebis.it.hds.gnd.in.subfields.SubFieldTools

  • public class SubFieldTools
extends java.lang.Object
    Several static methods to help processing the "subfield" element of marcXML.
    Version:
    30.03.2017 uh initial
    Author:
    Uwe Reh (uh), HeBIS-IT

    • Method Detail

      • copyValues

        public static void copyValues(java.lang.String recordId,
                              java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.util.List<java.lang.String>> dataField,
                              java.lang.String subFieldCode,
                              org.apache.solr.common.SolrInputDocument doc,
                              java.lang.String fieldName,
                              boolean repeatable,
                              java.lang.String regExFilter)
        Helper to copy value(s) of an subfield to an document field
        Parameters:
        recordId - The identificator of the current record (only used for logging)
        dataField - The internal representation of the marc category
        subFieldCode - Code of the subfield to select
        doc - The SolrDocument to fill
        fieldName - Name of the field to fill
        repeatable - Should the subfield be repeatable
        regExFilter - Optional regex to skip unwanted entries

      • getFirstValue

        public static java.lang.String getFirstValue(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.util.List<java.lang.String>> dataField,
                                             java.lang.String subFieldCode)
        Helper to extract the first occurrence of the subfield
        Parameters:
        dataField - The internal representation of the marc category
        subFieldCode - Code of the subfield to select
        Returns:
        The first value of the subfield or NULL, if the subfield isn't provided or empty.

      • getValues

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> getValues(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.util.List<java.lang.String>> dataField,
                                                         java.lang.String subFieldCode)
        Helper to extract the first occurrence of the subfield
        Parameters:
        dataField - The internal representation of the marc category
        subFieldCode - Code of the subfield to select
        Returns:
        The value list of the (repeated) subfield. If the subfield isn't provided a empty list will returned.

      • addSubField

        public static void addSubField(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.util.List<java.lang.String>> dataField,
                               javax.xml.stream.XMLStreamReader rawreader)
        Pack the XML subfield value(s) into an List (internal representation)
        Parameters:
        dataField - The internal representation of the record
        rawreader - The stax reader

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> newList(java.lang.String... data)
        Build a list of variable amount of arguments.
        Parameters:
        data - One or more strings
        Returns:
        A list of the given strings
